channel.title: Notice board | Unimi
channel.description: General notice board of the University of Milan "La Statale"

item.title: Se.Fa offices closure during Christmas holidays
item.description: The Se.Fa offices of the Faculty of Political, Economic and Social Sciences will be closed on 30 and 31 December 2024.%0A

item.title: Closure of Humanities Se.Fa Offices during Christmas holidays
item.description: Se.Fa Offices at the Faculty of Humanities will be closed on 30 and 31 December 2024.%0A

item.title: Notice
item.description: On Friday 13 December, from 9 am to 1 pm, the following platforms will not be available due to maintenance: spoc.unimi.it, servicemanagement.unimi.it, informastudenti.unimi.it, reclamistudenti.unimi.it%0A

item.title: Upcoming strike
item.description: On Friday, 13 December there may be service disruptions due to a general strike. However, this will not affect the following services: final exams for Bachelor‚Äôs and Master‚Äôs degrees, postgraduate schools and PhD programmes, issuing of urgent certificates.%0A

item.title: University Scholarships final rankings academic year 2024/25
item.description: The final rankings of the University Scholarships a.y. 2024/25 for students enrolled into successive years, in the first year of a Bachelor and the first year of a single-cycle master degree programme have been published.%0A%0A‚ñ∂Ô∏è Learn more on Unimi.it

item.title: Call for the English language development course in view of the B2 First (FCE) exam - SOLD OUT
item.description: Registration is open for the English language development course with a view to sitting the Cambridge B2 First (FCE) exam. Classes, for the whole duration of 20 hours, are taking place in person in January-February at the SLAM Centre according to the calendar reported in the call.%0A%0AüìÑ Read the call for further details

item.title: On-campus student workers needed
item.description: The School of Exercise and Sports Sciences is looking for 4 student workers.%0AGet all the details in the calls.%0A%0A‚ñ∂Ô∏è Learn more on Unimi.it

item.title: StaiSano: call for applications to receive a free pair of eyeglasses
item.description: As part of its sponsoring activities for the project ‚ÄúStaiSano! Obiettivo Cento Anni‚Äù, OneSight EssilorLuxottica Foundation has decided to donate 100 pairs of eyeglasses (lenses included) to 100 students who meet the eligibility requirements specified in this notice.%0A%0A‚ñ∂Ô∏è Learn more on Unimi.it

item.title: Information sessions about the Erasmus+ programme 2025-2026
item.description: We inform all interested students at the School of Pharmacy that two information sessions will be organised regarding international mobility and the Erasmus+ programme 2025-2026. For further details please see the whole notice.%0A%0A‚ñ∂Ô∏è Learn more on Unimi.it

item.title: Call for the C1 Advanced (CAE) exam on 21 + 22 January 2025 - SOLD OUT
item.description: The call is open to register for the digital Cambridge English C1 Advanced (CAE) exam scheduled on 21 + 22 January 2025.%0A%0AüìÑ Read the call for further details

item.title: Call for the C2 Proficiency (CPE) exam on 22 + 23 January 2025 - SOLD OUT
item.description: The call is open to register for the digital Cambridge English C2 Proficiency (CPE) exam scheduled on 22 + 23 January 2025.%0A%0AüìÑ Read the call for further details

item.title: Faculty Championship 2025
item.description: To encourage students to participate in the competitions, classes will be suspended on the following dates: %0A‚Ä¢ Tuesday, 15 April 2025 ONLY for students of the LITA campus in Segrate (from 11 am onwards)%0A%0A‚Ä¢ Wednesday, 21 May 2025 for all students of the Faculty of Medicine (all classes scheduled for the day). %0A%0A
